author: hwright
msg: Fix issue #3171: Add MacPorts and Apple's Developer Tools to list of Mac OS X
distribution sources.  The former has been there for a while, so add the later.
Add Apple's developer tools to the Mac OS X section.

author: hwright
msg: (svn_sqlite__step): On error, don't finalize the statement, but just reset it.
This prevents the double-finalization of statements later on when closing

author: hwright
msg: Introduce and use a printf()-style API for binding arguments to sqlite

author: cmpilato
msg: On the http-protocol-v2 branch: Unbreak capabilities parsing broken in r34912.
(You shouldn't use pointer equality comparison against #defines,
because the preprocessor effectively substitutes the defined values in
all the places it is used, creating multiple individual string
instances, each with their own unpredictable pointer values.)
these static strings, which were errantly removed in r34912.
Now compare against the restored static capabilities string pointers.
